name: WikiTaxonomyGenerator
description: This tool generates tables of content for pages with a taxonomy header.
author: Dimaros B.V.

inputs.name: root
inputs.label: Path to the Wiki
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the path to the Wiki

inputs.name: headerStart
inputs.label: Start of the Taxonomy Header
inputs.helpMarkDown: How should a Taxonomy Header start? for example: **_Taxonomy Header_**

inputs.name: taxonomyPath
inputs.label: Path to the Taxonomy
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the path to the Taxonomy (default: 'Taxonomy')

inputs.name: headerEnd
inputs.label: End of the Taxonomy Header
inputs.helpMarkDown: How should a Taxonomy Header end? (default: equal to headerStart)
